about_the_game:
"Uka & Haruka: Hentai Puzzle 18+" is a puzzle game in which the player needs to collect images of girls by rotating the puzzle pieces, while watching beautiful girls in parallel.

The game tells the love story of Uki and Haruka. Their relationship is unusual, Haruka is more active than Uka. Haruka usually takes the upper hand in the relationship and dominates the relationship and bed. ♡(´｡- ᵕ -｡) ♡

The game is built around progressing through levels in stages. Starting with more closed clothing, the player unlocks increasingly nude pictures of the girl. As you progress through the game, the girl flirts with you, making pleasant sounds. Also in the gallery you can include the girl's moans. (*^.^*)

Game Features:
  • Hand drawn artwork
  • Art animations
  • Heroine voiceovers
  • Superpowers: explosion and aiming
  • Gallery

Characters


Haruka

A rebel girl who loves adventure and hardcore sex. Loves leather and being dominated. In love with Uka, wants to be with her and satisfy all her fantasies.

Uka

A shy and somewhat closed off girl. She also likes Haruka, especially when Haruka dominates her, which makes her even more turned on. She has a cute face that hides a lot of secrets.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game, "Uka & Haruka: Hentai Puzzle 18+," contains explicit adult content, including fully nude characters. The game features:

Explicit Nudity: The characters are depicted fully nude in various stages of undress as the player progresses through the levels.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i7 CPU @ 2.6GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 555 w/ 1GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i5 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i7 @ 2.7GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated standalone GPU w/ 1GB+ VRAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
